name: WKHostingController
desc: A WatchKit interface controller that hosts a SwiftUI view hierarchy.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a hosting controller object that you can use to implement your app’s main interface using SwiftUI views

items.name: var body: Body
items.desc: The root view of the view hierarchy to display for your interface controller.

items.name: func updateBodyIfNeeded()
items.desc: Updates the interface controller’s set of views immediately, if updates are pending.

items.name: func setNeedsBodyUpdate()
items.desc: Invalidates the current SwiftUI views and triggers an update during the next cycle.
